title: Game doesn't load post lobby
body: I have been waiting to get into my game for roughly 20 minutes now.  I invited a friend into a bots game (we haven't played in at least a year, don't judge).  I have tried killing the client and using the reconnect button in the lobby, but still nothing.  Is there some bug or something?  I cannot get into the game at all.

replies.body: Often times that happens because some kind of firewall or antivirus setting is blocking the client from reaching our servers. Do me a favor and [**update your firewall exceptions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3), or simply disable them while playing league to test it. Please be sure to test this in a custom/practice game so you don't get any unwanted penalties!!
For clarity, I get to the loading screen and just sit there at 0% connected for everyone.
